$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|We're to spar in these outfits?
Rather impractical, aren't they?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|These battles are just for show,
I think. No need to take it seriously.$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|So, we're fighting for the same
side? ...Interesting.$k$p
$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Hmph! They're not half bad.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|Yes... We'd be wise to retreat.$k$p$Sbs150|
